comment.author: 49639463@N00
comment._content: Beautiful and peaceful image. It looks as if she is sleeping

comment.author: 20785858@N04
comment._content: She looks very sweet. This much more natural than most post mortem images; it's as though she's just having a nap in the afternoon.

comment.author: 21788675@N05
comment._content: I thought she was napping...till I read the description :(

comment.author: 8213845@N05
comment._content: how incredible and mistic..

comment.author: 60991687@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Black and White [AllEdges], and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 27448710@N06
comment._content: A little Angel

comment.author: 27888113@N03
comment._content: elle semble dormir parmi les anges

comment.author: 79321365@N00
comment._content: I believe this image was used for the book (on postmortem photography) called Secure the Shadow.

comment.author: 21423154@N03
comment._content: this is such a powerful image. the lighting and composition is magnificent, and the child looks as if she is sleeping. this is definitely an unforgettable photograph.

comment.author: 90142556@N00
comment._content: so sad. i really thought she was sleeping before i read the title.

comment.author: 25278423@N00
comment._content: This is an amazing photo of this little angel...she does not look deceased and in that it breaks my heart for it is as if she is asleep but it is eternal  and in that is so very sad...

comment.author: 26506277@N05
81594342@N00
comment._content: It was very common during the erealy days of photography to take such post-mortem pictures. Some times the subjects where set up in such a way as if they here posing live. Here some further information: Post-Mortem Daguerreotypes

comment.author: 44578649@N00
comment._content: I too thought she was sleeping... she is such a lovely child.  This photograph must have been treasured by her parents, how unbearably sad they must have been to loose such an angel!  Heartbreaking.

comment.author: 29523042@N03
comment._content: The photographer did a great job I think. She looks very peaceful, and if I hadn't seen the title I would not have known that it was just her little body there.  While it is quite sad to imagine loosing your little girl, it was probably a wonderful gift to the parents to be able to have one last picture of the house of their little darling's soul.

comment.author: 56982068@N00
comment._content: heartbreaking

comment.author: 8638861@N02
comment._content: beautiful child... now in the arms of Jesus

comment.author: 48460867@N08
comment._content: So beautiful child, but is sad to know that a little cute thing like that is dead!

comment.author: 54573589@N05
comment._content: Many families even today take photos of their babies that die at brith or are stillborn

comment.author: 56704793@N03
comment._content: Oh, my God!!!

comment._content:
powerful .. and beautiful.

memento mori.
memento vivere.

comment.author: 9121052@N03
comment._content: It's a very artistic photograph. RIP little angel.

comment.author: 50061127@N05
comment._content: Beautiful.. is it a tintype?

comment.author: 78645046@N04
comment._content: Notice a 'Star of David' necklace appears to have been placed in her hands. Although I'm not 100% certain of the object. If so, this little girl is probably Jewish? Looking more closely, I'm also wondering if a piece of fabric (containing the 'Star of David') has been drapped over her dress? She was a lovely child! For more beautiful images of post mortem children: www.paulfrecker.com/home.cfm?pagetype=library Also, here is a moving video posted on "You Tube": www.youtube.com/watch?v=07hNTSNDzaE
